name: Giuseppe Carenini
content: Giuseppe Carenini - Home Page Giuseppe Carenini Professor, Computer Science Department Director of the UBC Master in Data Science Member of : UBC NLP Group,  CANARY, IUI Group, CAIDA, LCI, HCI@UBC and ICICS Associate Member of: Designing for People,  IRES (sustainability), Data Science Institute (DSI) Pospective grad student? Join our great graduate program Research Interests: Artificial Intelligence - User Modeling, Preference Elicitation, Decision Theory, Machine Learning Computational Linguistics - Discourse, Summarization, Natural Language Generation, Argumentation, Multimedia HCI - Intelligent Interfaces, Information Visualization & Interactive Techniques Professional information: Co-organizing: EMNLP 2021 Workshop on New Frontiers in Summarization! (2019 ed.) Tutorial: ACL 2019 Discourse Analysis and its Applications Book Perspectives on Business Intelligence Apr, 2013 ACM TIST Special Issue on Intelligent Visual Interfaces for Text Analysis Vol. 3 Issue 2, Feb. 2012 Book  Methods for Mining and Summarizing Text Conversations Jul. 2011 Publications (Google Scholar) (dblp) Teaching: Grad 502 intro AI, 503 grad NLP Ugrad: 322 AI-1, 422-AI-2, 436N- NLP Contact Info:   Office Address     -    Home Address   -   <lastName>@cs.ubc.ca
